netcloak.name: NetCloak VPN
netcloak.description: Privacy-focused VPN service for mobile devices

versions.summary: Initial privacy policy. Establishes no-logs policy, minimal data collection, and age restriction (18+).
highlights: Minimal data collection (IP addresses only for security)

versions.summary: Initial Terms of Use. Establishes service rules, acceptable use policy, and legal framework for the free, ad-supported VPN service.
highlights: Free service with ad-supported model (8-second video ads)

playlounge.name: Play Lounge
playlounge.description: Multiplayer board game platform for web and mobile

versions.summary: Initial privacy policy. Establishes privacy-first design with no accounts, session-only data, and minimal collection practices.
highlights: No user accounts or personal information required
Session-only data storage (auto-deleted on app close)
Safe for all ages (PEGI 3 / Everyone rated)

versions.summary: Initial Terms of Use. Establishes service rules, acceptable use policy, and legal framework for the free, ad-supported multiplayer gaming platform.
highlights: Comprehensive acceptable use policy (fair play, no cheating)

odometer.name: Odo - Simple Mileage Tracking
odometer.description: Privacy-first mileage tracking app for iOS and Android

versions.summary: Updated privacy policy reflecting app rename to Odo and addition of optional location snapshots feature.
highlights: App renamed from Odometer to Odo
Optional location snapshots (one-time GPS capture, not tracking)
All data stored locally in SQLite database
No analytics, telemetry, or crash reporting

versions.summary: Initial privacy policy under Odometer name. Zero data collection policy for 100% offline app.
highlights: Zero data collection - app collects nothing
All data stored locally in SQLite database
No analytics, telemetry, or crash reporting
No third-party services of any kind
User has complete control over all data

versions.summary: Updated Terms of Use reflecting app rename to Odo and addition of optional location snapshots feature.
highlights: App renamed from Odometer to Odo
Free service with no purchases or subscriptions
Record-keeping tool only - not tax/legal advice
All data stored locally on user's device

versions.summary: Initial Terms of Use under Odometer name. Establishes service rules for free, offline mileage tracking.
highlights: Free service with no purchases or subscriptions
Record-keeping tool only - not tax/legal advice
All data stored locally on user's device
